review.title: “E-merging Technologies Group, Inc. is a forward thinking firm.”
review.pros: Pros – E-merging Technologies Group, Inc. treats its employees like people and not like they are just a number.
review.cons: Cons – One of the downsides of working at E-merging Technologies Group, Inc. is that some of the work is contract based; the employees are sometimes at risk and are at the mercy of their respective Federal Customer, but every individual federal contractor already understands this.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep shooting for the stars!

review.title: “My E-Merge Experience”
review.pros: Pros – A dynamic environment to let your creativity run wild
review.cons: Cons – Over engagement in a task you love to do
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
